channel.title: Fireside Chats - Podcasts with Authors
channel.description: This podcast series presents a lively collection of conversations with book authors that goes deeper than most surface-level interviews.
channel.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast series presents a lively collection of conversations with book authors that goes deeper than most surface-level interviews.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A lively collection of conversations with book authors.

item.title: Chat with Shannon Stowell
item.description: During this 24 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Shannon Stowell, co-author of Riding the Hulahula to the Arctic Ocean: A Guide to 50 Extraordinary Adventures for the Seasoned Traveler.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 24 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Shannon Stowell, co-author of Riding the Hulahula to the Arctic Ocean: A Guide to 50 Extraordinary Adventures for the Seasoned Traveler.

item.title: Chat with Michaele Weissman
item.description: During this 23 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Michaele Weissman, author of God in a Cup: The Obsessive Quest for the Perfect Coffee.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 23 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Michaele Weissman, author of God in a Cup: The Obsessive Quest for the Perfect Coffee.

item.itunes:summary: During this 23 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Michaele Weissman, author of God in a Cup: The Obsessive Quest for the Perfect Coffee.

item.title: Chat with Dan White
item.description: During this 30 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Dan White, author of The Cactus Eaters: How I Lost My Mind- And Almost Found Myself- On The Pacific Crest Trail.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 30 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Dan White, author of The Cactus Eaters: How I Lost My Mind- And Almost Found Myself- On The Pacific Crest Trail.

item.title: Chat with Bill Yenne
item.description: During this 20 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Bill Yenne, author of Guinness: The 250 Year Quest for the Perfect Pint.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 20 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Bill Yenne, author of Guinness: The 250 Year Quest for the Perfect Pint.

item.title: Chat with Glen Hiemstra
item.description: Lisa Haneberg chats with futurist Glen Heimstra in this 32 minute podcast. Topics covered include reasons why strategic planning is an oxymoron, the important difference between a vision and mission, and how leaders can create their preferred future. We also chat about ways to shape the future, in a broader sense, and how to improve the world.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: Lisa Haneberg chats with futurist Glen Heimstra in this 32 minute podcast. Topics covered include reasons why strategic planning is an oxymoron, the important difference between a vision and mission, and how leaders can create their preferred future. We also chat about ways to shape the future, in a broader sense, and how to improve the world.

item.title: Chat with Bill Strickland
item.description: During this 20 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Bill Strickland, President and CEO of Manchester Bidwell Corporation and author of Make the Impossible Possible.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 20 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Bill Strickland, President and CEO of Manchester Bidwell Corporation and author of Make the Impossible Possible.
